name: Lasernoid: Reborn
description:
Here is a relaunch of Lasernoid! A game I attempted to make for Newgrounds long ago, but didn't do the best due to using a program I was unfamiliar with..

However, I have just received my copy of Game Maker Studio, an engine I have been using since I was 6, and Lasernoid has reawaken!

Now with more enemies, upgrades and epic challenges, Lasernoid brings the retro days of old to a new and modern universe of the digital age.

Can you conquer the Noid?

NOTE: This is my first HTML Game, please let me know of any issues, glitches, crashes or any other bugs.

Credits to Deshiel for Special BGM track!
Special thanks to Kyle Blake, brother, for design of Spectro Boss.
